refnamediv.refpurpose: Removes the hidden flag for the specified objects.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Removes the hidden flag for the specified objects. When this flag is set, the objects do not appear in ls, t or tops command outputs. The -a option on the ls, t, and tops commands will force hidden objects to appear in its output.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the unhide command to remove the flag that specifies an object as hidden.

example.title: Remove the flag that specifies an object as hidden.

listitem.para: Removes the flag that marks sol_a as hidden.
